EmailTemplate.name: 07.2 - Shipping to Team Phun Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Order.Account_Name__c} Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c} is shipping to Team Phun
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Invoice {!Order.Invoice_Number__c}/Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} is shipping to Team Phun. Please prepare for Quality Assurance.
